data.name: Water Girls - Adult Dakimakuras
data.detailed_description:
A set of two Double Sided Adult Dakimakura Illustrations.
Prepared for the characters Jasmin and Celia

Images included are high resolution 5000x1665 pixels in size.
N.b. these dakimakuras cannot be resold or put to commercial use in other properties and are for private use only.

Once installed a folder will appear in the game directory called 'DLC - Dakimakuras' with the .png Dakimakura images included within.

data.short_description: A set of two Double Sided Adult Dakimakura Illustrations. Prepared for the characters Jasmin and Celia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC pack adds several Images to the game directory showing the main characters in a lingerie outfit and naked, in a dakimakura style (as if laying on a bed). Images are High Resolution and explicit.
